Subject: Re: CBS News Inquiry

I'll handle. Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Aug 21, 2019, at 7:01 PM, 
From: Brown, Bridget 
Sent: Wednesday, August 21, 2019 18:56 
To: 
Cc: @CND National Desk Staff 
Subject: CBS News Inquiry 
Good evening â€” 
wrote: 
Reaching out from the CBS News National Desk. We are following reports that at least 8 jail officials knew that Jeffrey 
Epstein was not to be left alone in his cell leading up to his death. Can you confirm this? Do you have any comment? 
Please 
reply all. 
Thank you, 
Bridget Brown 
News Associate National Desk 
EFTA00016938
